Battera::

She was slumped over as she sat on the ground.  Her data banks were 
running on high, transfering the information to Vulios.  She dreamed 
that she was walking down a path in the forest.  She saw Cybershark 
standing there.  He stood there, then turned and walked away.  She 
She ran after him, calling to him.  She was about to catch up to him, 
when he dissappeared.  She called out,"CyberShark!"  But heard only 
her own echo bouncing around in the forest.  

She muttered in her sleep,"CyberShark..."

She then turned and saw Vulios.  She called out to him too, but he 
dissappeared into the mist of the forest.  She turned and saw Hell 
Beast there, right next to her.  She screamed and tried to run, but 
he reached out and caught her.  The next thing she knew, she had a 
collar around her neck.  And Hell Beast was holding the leash that 
connected to her collar.  She was sitting next to Hell Beast as he 
sat on a throne made of transformer parts.  She was a prisoner, her 
worst nightmare was unfolding before her.  She was forsed to look on 
as Hell Beast had CyberShark and Vulois in cages, dangling over a pit 
of molten lava. She pleaded and begged, but Hell Beast just laughed.  
Hell Beast told her that for her leaving him in the first place, it 
would cost her the lives of her friends.  She tried to fly up, but 
Hell Beast pulled on the leash and she fell to the ground, in front 
of Hell Beast.   She pleaded again for the life of her friends.  She 
looked at Cybershark.  She looked, and he was staring back at her.  
She blinked and then instead of cybershark, it was a dead, decaying 
form of him.  THe same with Vulios.  She saw thier rotting corpses in 
the cages with Hell Beast tugging  on her leash, and laughing at her.
She started to cry at the site of her dead friends. 

She started to cry in her sleep.
